title: Kicked from game
body: Right as a solo q game was going to start the game suddenly dropped with the message "sorry we were unable to load your game" as the response the server gave me. Wat just happened

replies.body: It sounds like your connection failed to transition you into the game server.  If this happened for everyone, it's possible that the game server was unable to create the match, so it's as if it never existed.  Let me know if that's the case, otherwise we may need to look into tuning up your network!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=rztraGqL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-27T21:30:01.000+0000)
>
> It sounds like your connection failed to transition you into the game server.  If this happened for everyone, it's possible that the game server was unable to create the match, so it's as if it never existed.  Let me know if that's the case, otherwise we may need to look into tuning up your network!

for more clarification, after the game closed it wasnt like i couldnt reconnect to the game. the entire que dropped and i had to re-enter play solo q. only i didnt have a dodge timer penalty and i didnt lose lp for whatever happened and the game itself i cannot find in my match history
that game does not show up in my match history, so i would guess its probably the former
